output_list.criticism: In the transfer function, the value of _value is not checked before adding it to the balance of the recipient. If the sum of the balance and _value exceeds the maximum uint256 value, an integer overflow will occur.

In the transferFrom function, the value of _value is not checked before subtracting it from the balance of the sender. If the difference between the balance and _value is negative, an integer overflow will occur.

In the approve function, the value of _value is not checked before adding it to the allowance of the spender. If the sum of the allowance and _value exceeds the maximum uint256 value, an integer overflow will occur.

In the mint function, the value of _value is not checked before adding it to the balance of the holder. If the sum of the balance and _value exceeds the maximum uint256 value, an integer overflow will occur.
In the burn function, the value of _value is not checked before subtracting it from the totalSupply. If the difference between the totalSupply and _value is negative, an integer overflow will occur.
